benchmark_details.name: DataAgent Benchmark
benchmark_details.overview: The DataAgent Benchmark evaluates the performance of Large Language Models (LLMs) in answering zero-shot queries related to various datasets, measuring their ability to extract correlations and insights through data analysis tasks.
benchmark_details.data_type: datasets of both numerical and categorical data

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Evaluate the efficacy of Large Language Models as a Language Data Scientist for answering queries in data science.

data.source: Generated using GPT-3.5, representing a variety of scenarios in data science.
data.size: 15 benchmark datasets of varying sizes (50 to 300 rows each)
data.annotation: Manually created answers for the benchmarks.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy was calculated by comparing the model's predicted outputs against manually calculated and supervised answers.
methodology.interpretation: An accuracy score reflects how many queries were answered correctly compared to the total number of queries.
methodology.validation: The model's outputs were tested against a set of manually created questions and answers.
